r.s: The source code for the PEAR website
r.n: * Fix Bug #10280: go-pear tries to install Console_Getopt twice [rosier] * Fix Bug #10375: The list of patches gets displayed after the footer [cellog] * Fix Bug #10376: [go-pear] webfrontend filename is ignored [tias] * Fix Bug #10379: election results are inaccurately calculated [cellog] * Implement Feature #10380: announce new constitution on front page [cellog] Also, fix fatal error in some cases if user is not pear.dev karma user
